title: Astro Dev Executor
description: Start the Astro development server with hot reloading and advanced debugging

host.description: Hostname or IP address to bind the development server to

port.description: Port number where the development server will listen for requests

x-prompt.message: Which port should the dev server use?

open.description: Automatically open the development site in your default browser after starting

config.description: Path to Astro configuration file (relative to project root)
config.x-prompt: Path to Astro config file (leave empty for default):

root.description: Path to the project root directory (relative to workspace root)

verbose.description: Enable detailed logging for debugging development server issues

inspect.description: Enable Node.js inspector for debugging server-side code

envFile.description: Path to environment variables file to load during development
